alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 9:47AM PST until February 22 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches above 1000 feet, except up to 18 inches above 2500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...From late Monday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow conditions possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
